name: mutumwa-ai
description: Multi-component AI application with document collector, frontend, and server

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd collector &&  npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:collector"
scripts.lint: cd collector && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d

author: Mutumwa AI Team
